name: Mimicry (CrashBuG)
description:
Individual Name:

Sachin Birua a.k.a CrashBuG

 

Summary:

Fight against enemies who follow your lead, Can you beat them and escape the realm?

Controls:

WASD- Movement keys

Space - Jump

Shift = Sprint

Mouse - Look Around

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Focus

Escape – Menu

 

Platform:

Windows (64bit)

 

Marketplace Packs:

Modular RPG Heroes Playlist

Chameleon Post Process

Platformer Starter Pack
